data.meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.
data.sentence: The word أُنْزِلَ comes from the root ن ز ل and is associated with the meanings: to descend, come down, go down, happen, alight at, settle in a place, lodge. anzala - to send down, give. nazulun - that which is prepared for a guest's entertainment, abode, gift. manzil - mansion, station. nazzala - to cause to descend, send down. tanziil - sending down, divine revelation, orderly arrangement and authentic compilation, gradual revelation.

The word أَوْ comes from the root ا و and is associated with the meanings: or

data.meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.
data.sentence: The word وَاللَّهُ comes from the root ا ل ه and is associated with the meanings: to serve, worship or adore; to protect, grant refuge, preserve save, rescue, liberate; object of worship ie God; (Alif-Lam-Lam-ha) God, the one true God applied as a proper name denoting the true god, comprising all the excellent divine names; a unity comprising all the essences of existing things.

data.meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.
data.sentence: The word كُلِّ comes from the root ك ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lose father and child, lose direct heirs, be weary, tired, weak, have only remote relations.

data.meanings: to will/wish. shaiun (pl. ashyaa'un) - thing/matter, affair in any way, at all, what is willed or wished, aught, any extent. In direct objective case it is often used to denote the meaning "a little", "bit", "at all". Adverbially it means "in any way", "at all".
data.sentence: The word شَيْءٍ comes from the root ش ي ا and is associated with the meanings: to will/wish. shaiun (pl. ashyaa'un) - thing/matter, affair in any way, at all, what is willed or wished, aught, any extent. In direct objective case it is often used to denote the meaning "a little", "bit", "at all". Adverbially it means "in any way", "at all".

data.meanings: to come/do, commit, (with preposition bi) to bring, produce, (2:275) to receive
data.sentence: The word جَاءَ comes from the root ج ي ا and is associated with the meanings: to come/do, commit, (with preposition bi) to bring, produce, (2:275) to receive

data.meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.
data.sentence: The word يَقُولُوا comes from the root ق و ل and is associated with the meanings: to say/speak, to call, to be named, word/speech, utterance, a thing said, greeting, discourse, one who says/speaks. To inspire/transmit/relate/answer/think/profess, emit an opinion on, indicate a state or condition or circumstance. qa'ilun - speaker, indicator.

data.meanings: to rule/command/reign, be capable, to control, power/authority, king, kingdom.
data.sentence: The word مَلَكٌ comes from the root م ل ك and is associated with the meanings: to rule/command/reign, be capable, to control, power/authority, king, kingdom.

data.meanings: to entrust, confirm, give, charge, dispose affairs, lean upon, reply upon.
data.sentence: The word وَكِيلٌ comes from the root و ك ل and is associated with the meanings: to entrust, confirm, give, charge, dispose affairs, lean upon, reply upon.

data.meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.
data.sentence: The word نَذِيرٌ comes from the root ن ذ ر and is associated with the meanings: (Nun-Thal-Ra) to dedicate, make a vow, warn, admonish, caution, promise voluntarily, offer present. nadhiir - warner, one who informs and averts calamity, who cautions and put one on guard.

data.meanings: To leave off, leave alone, abandon/desert/relinquish/quit, forsake, give up anything, neglect, omit, bequeath anything to anyone.

data.meanings: Became narrow or strait. Became choked, surcharged, or overfilled with something.Treated or behave towards someone with hardness or harshness.Means of living became straitened, property went away, poor.An evil state of condition.

Became choked, surcharged, or overfilled with something.Treated or behave towards someone with hardness or harshness.Means of living became straitened, property went away, poor.An evil state of condition.

data.meanings: To return from, come back, proceed, issue or emanate from, go forward, advance or promote, come to pass, happen, emanate from, strike on the chest/breast, commence. Anything that fronts, or faces one; hence breast, chest or bosom [often meaning his mind]. The fore part of anything. Going, or turning back and away.sadr - heart/breast/chest, mind, prominent place.
data.sentence: The word صَدْرُكَ comes from the root ص د ر and is associated with the meanings: To return from, come back, proceed, issue or emanate from, go forward, advance or promote, come to pass, happen, emanate from, strike on the chest/breast, commence. Anything that fronts, or faces one; hence breast, chest or bosom [often meaning his mind]. The fore part of anything. Going, or turning back and away.sadr - heart/breast/chest, mind, prominent place.

data.meanings: to collect and store up, treasure, bury in the ground a treasure.
